name: ParallelConundrum
description:
Parallel Conundrum is a simple turn based puzzle game where you have to solve puzzles in parallel.

Made  for the LibGDX Semptember 2020 Jam with the theme: "Parallel Worlds".

How to play:

W,A,S,D keys or Arrow keys to move.
ESC, P keys to pause.
I, O keys to navigate through levels.

Music by:

Abstraction http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
